description: Start with n and reach 2 by repeatedly either dividing by d where d <= the square root or by adding 1. The division steps are free, but adding 1 costs 1 point. a(n) is the smallest cost to reach 2.
crossrefs: Cf. A047988. Same formula except you cannot subtract 1 (only add).
author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 15 1999
